WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
DNC 01.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL 01 JUL BY
   M/V OCEANIC CHAMPION TOWING 12 9260 METER
   LONG CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   24-25.12S 041-12.16W, 24-17.03S 040-54.87W,
   25-10.03S 040-23.81W, 25-18.44S 040-41.03W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 1882/17.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 02 JUL 17.
